    Rook​(boolean white, String name, boolean moved)
    creates a Rook, a chess piece that can move up, down, left, or right however many spaces it wants, shows whether or not it's white, its output name, and whether or not it has moved

  • Field Details

    • moved

      public boolean moved
      whether or not this piece has moved

  • Constructor Details

    • Rook

      public Rook​(boolean white, String name, boolean moved)
      creates a Rook, a chess piece that can move up, down, left, or right however many spaces it wants, shows whether or not it's white, its output name, and whether or not it has moved
      Parameters:
      white - whether it's a white piece or a black piece
      name - output string that will be shown in the ascii art
      moved - whether it has moved or not

  • Method Details

    • isValidMove

      public static boolean isValidMove​(int initial_col, int initial_row, int end_col, int end_row, ChessPiece[][] board, Rook o)
      This is a boolean method to check if the Rook can be moved from its initial spot to the end spot that we're trying to get to.
      Parameters:
      initial_col - initial column that the Rook resides in
      initial_row - initial row that the Rook resides in
      end_col - column that we're trying to move the Bishop to
      end_row - row that we're trying to move the Bishop to
      board - the 2D array of Rook pieces that contains the Knight
      o - the actual Pawn object in the 2D array
      Returns:
      whether or not the move from [initial_row][initial_col] to [end_row][end_col] can be executed

    • Check

      public static boolean Check​(int row, int col, ChessPiece[][] board, ChessPiece o)
      Checking is there's any rooks in any direction to put us in check at this specific position
      Parameters:
      row - row we're checking check for
      col - column we're checking check for
      board - 2D array of chesspieces
      o - the King object or the object that is being attacked
      Returns:
      if there's a rook that is attacking the king or the specified spot
